A postcard of the Spanish poster for the 1998 movie _Lulu on the Bridge_ starring Harvey Keitel and Mira Sorvino. This postcard was published by Memory Card of Spain in the 1990s. It is about 4 x 6 inches (10x15cm) size. It is unused and in new condition ... Read More

A postcard of the Spanish poster for the 1998 movie _Lulu on the Bridge_ starring Harvey Keitel and Mira Sorvino.

This postcard was published by Memory Card of Spain in the 1990s. It is about 4 x 6 inches (10x15cm) size. It is unused and in new condition.
